description: **Tool Overview**: This tool is related to the enabling of Windows Extended Protection by default with the upcoming cumulative update for Exchange Server 2019. Extended Protection enhances security by helping to prevent credential theft and mitigating man-in-the-middle attacks. This feature aligns with security best practices for Exchange, ensuring that sensitive communications are safeguarded. Users are encouraged to prepare for its implementation by reviewing relevant guidelines and understanding the prerequisites necessary for its activation. It is advisable to familiarize yourself with the dos and don'ts of using extended protection to ensure a smooth integration into your server environment. **Specific resources** include detailed documentation and best practices available for Exchange administrators, guiding the setup and configuration processes.
